definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The top of the funnel is connected to a tube.
sentences.chinese: 通過杯狀或漏斗狀吹口吹奏的銅管樂器。

sentences.english: Copper tubing shall not be used on the downstream side of the backflow preventer.
sentences.chinese: 在防迴流閥的下游不應該安裝銅管。

sentences.english: They announced themselves with the subtlety of a brass band.
sentences.chinese: 以銅管樂隊般美妙的聲音宣佈他們的到來。

sentences.english: You'll want to make sure that there is no water in the copper pipe you are soldering.
sentences.chinese: 你先要確認要焊接的銅管裏沒有水。

sentences.english: Many of the workers play in the factory's brass band.
sentences.chinese: 許多工人都在工廠銅管樂隊中演奏。

sentences.english: Flanging, easy flow and the resistance caused by impurities hold, the brass has corrosive effect.
sentences.chinese: 內翻邊，易造成阻流及雜質存留，對銅管有腐蝕作用。

sentences.english: The results show that the failure of oil-cooler is bolt-like dezincification corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，冷油器銅管的腐蝕屬於栓狀脫鋅腐蝕。

sentences.english: They invited me to join their brass band.
sentences.chinese: 他們約請我加盟他們銅管樂隊。

sentences.english: The brass band is banging away in the park.
sentences.chinese: 銅管樂隊在公園裏吹吹打打。

sentences.english: An organ stop that produces a tone like that of the brass wind instrument.
sentences.chinese: 銅管樂器家族中任何一種像喇叭帶有筏的樂器。

sentences.english: School brass band will provide music for entertainment.
Jazz's brass instruments are often played alongside drums and stringed instruments.
sentences.chinese: 爵士樂中的銅管樂器通常會和鼓以及絃樂器一起演奏。

sentences.english: Flare up the cooper tube to connect a union.
sentences.chinese: 把銅管做成喇叭口形狀以便接上活絡接頭。

sentences.english: He plays in the brass of the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 他在管弦樂團裏演奏銅管樂器。
小喇叭和號角都是銅管樂器。

sentences.english: There are also early brass and keyboard instruments.
sentences.chinese: 這裏還有早期的銅管樂器和鍵盤樂器。
